titleStmt.title: Sixe idillia that is, sixe small, or petty poems, or æglogues, chosen out of the right famous Sicilian poet Theocritus, and translated into English verse.
Idylls. English
titleStmt.author: Theocritus.

notesStmt.note: An English translation of Theocritus' Idyllia.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
